emergence.strategy.evolution

Class Evolution

  • java.lang.Object
    • emergence.strategy.evolution.Evolution

  • public class Evolution
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for the evolutionary agent (3rd controller).

      • slidingWindow

        public void slidingWindow(core.game.StateObservation stateObs)
        The sliding window is used to store the information from the last generation. It cuts of the first action of the path and appends one new random action at the end.
        Parameters:
        stateObs -
